briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety Study to Evaluate MT-6548 in Hemodialysis Subjects Not Receiving ESAs With Anemia Associated With Chronic Kidney Disease in Japan
officialTitle: A Phase III, Open-label Study of MT-6548 in Hemodialysis Subjects With Anemia Associated With Chronic Kidney Disease in Japan
conditions: Anemia; Hemodialysis Dependent Chronic Kidney Disease
summary: For hemodialysis subjects not receiving ESAs with anemia associated with chronic kidney disease, evaluate Hb correction and maintenance effect and safety of MT-6548.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Hb Level of Week 20 and Week 24
